name: Introvert (Ace Savaid)
description:
Made in roughly 3 hours for Trijam #191: The 3 hour game jam with the theme of Isolated

Play as a Ghost Girl who just wants her snacks and soda but is afraid of the resident entities that looms her corridors.   Try to collect all of the snacks while not dying.. of fear. 

Collect spawning items around the map to gain points, also collect timers for more time.   Being around other entities lowers your health but having your personal space slowly restores it.


Controls

Move - WASD

Credits

Colour Palette - ColdR-CT15 Palette

All code sprites and sound effects by me.
